title: Add TabView property to set the individual tabs' Content from a data item in ItemSource
body: Currently, the only way to set content for TabView tabs is to set the content property of the items themselves, but for scenarios where we need to generate them from an ObservableCollection, this does not exist. TabView.ItemTemplate only allows us to set the "shared content" rather than individual tab content. We need a way to set the "TabView.ItemContent" to a property from our data source.
